Package ohos.global.resource.solidxml

Class Theme

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.global.resource.solidxml.Theme

  • public abstract class Theme
extends Object
    Provides resource attributes for a specific theme.

    A hash map returned by Theme#getThemeHash stores the theme attributes. You can call ResourceManager.getTheme(int) to obtain the Theme instance based on the resource ID.

    Since:
    3

    • Method Detail

      • getThemeHash

        public abstract HashMap<String,TypedAttribute> getThemeHash​()
        Obtains the hash map of this Theme. The hash map stores the theme attributes, containing theme names as keys and associated TypedAttribute as values.
        Returns:
        Returns the hash map of this Theme.
        Since:
        3

      • getCombinedTheme

        public abstract Theme getCombinedTheme​(Theme child)
        Obtains a combined theme formed by this Theme and another theme, which will act as a child theme.

        The attributes of the child theme will overwrite those of this Theme.

        Parameters:
        child - Indicates the child theme.
        Returns:
        Returns the combined theme.
        Since:
        3

      • set

        public abstract void set​(Theme theme)
        Sets this Theme to hold all the attribute values of an existing Theme instance.
        Parameters:
        theme - Indicates the Theme instance whose attribute values are to be assigned to this Theme.
        Since:
        4

      • getThemeHash

        public abstract HashMap<String,TypedAttribute> getThemeHash​(String[] selected)
        Obtains a hash map that contains selected attributes of this Theme.
        Parameters:
        selected - Indicates the set of selected attribute names.
        Returns:
        Returns the hash map that contains selected attributes of this Theme.
        Since:
        4

      • getStringValue

        public abstract String getStringValue​(String key)
                               throws IOException,
                                      NotExistException,
                                      WrongTypeException
        Obtains a string value of the attribute matching the key in this Theme.
        Parameters:
        key - Indicates the key in the theme.
        Returns:
        Returns the string value matching the key.
        Throws:
        NotExistException - Throws this exception if the key is not found, or the obtained value is null or another invalid value.
        IOException - Throws this exception if an I/O error occurs.
        WrongTypeException - Throws this exception if the attribute value matching the key is not a string value.
        Since:
        5

      • getBooleanValue

        public abstract boolean getBooleanValue​(String key,
                                        boolean defValue)
                                 throws IOException,
                                        NotExistException,
                                        WrongTypeException
        Obtains a boolean value of the attribute matching the key in this Theme.
        Parameters:
        key - Indicates the key in the theme.
        defValue - Indicates the default value.
        Returns:
        Returns the boolean value matching the key if obtained; returns the default value if the key is not found.
        Throws:
        NotExistException - Throws this exception if the obtained value is null or another invalid value.
        IOException - Throws this exception if an I/O error occurs.
        WrongTypeException - Throws this exception if the attribute value matching the key is not a boolean value.
        Since:
        5

                           throws IOException,
                                  NotExistException,
                                  WrongTypeException
        Obtains a color value of the attribute matching the key in this Theme.
        Parameters:
        key - Indicates the key in the theme.
        Returns:
        Returns an integer representing the color value matching the key.
        Throws:
        NotExistException - Throws this exception if the key is not found, or the obtained value is null or another invalid value.
        IOException - Throws this exception if an I/O error occurs.
        WrongTypeException - Throws this exception if the attribute value matching the key is not a color value.
        Since:
        5

      • getPixelValue

        public abstract int getPixelValue​(String key,
                                  boolean truncat)
                           throws IOException,
                                  NotExistException,
                                  WrongTypeException
        Obtains the pixel value matching the key in this Theme. This method is equivalent to getFloatValue(java.lang.String,float) except that its return value is an integer rounded from the original value.
        Parameters:
        key - Indicates the key in the theme.
        truncat - Specifies whether the returned result is truncated. The value true indicates that the decimal part of the float value is truncated, and false indicates that the float value is rounded off.
        Returns:
        Returns the pixel value matching the key.
        Throws:
        NotExistException - Throws this exception if the key is not found, or the obtained value is null or another invalid value.
        IOException - Throws this exception if an I/O error occurs.
        WrongTypeException - Throws this exception if the attribute value matching the key is not a pixel value.
        Since:
        5

      • getMediaValue

        public abstract Resource getMediaValue​(String key,
                                       ResourceManager resManager)
                                throws IOException,
                                       NotExistException,
                                       WrongTypeException
        Obtains media resources matching the key in this Theme.
        Parameters:
        key - Indicates the key in the theme.
        resManager - Indicates the ResourceManager instance used to obtain the media resource stream.
        Returns:
        Returns the media resources matching the key.
        Throws:
        NotExistException - Throws this exception if the key is not found, or the obtained value is null or another invalid value.
        IOException - Throws this exception if an I/O error occurs.
        WrongTypeException - Throws this exception if the key does not match any media resources.
        Since:
        5

      • getValue

        public abstract TypedAttribute getValue​(String key)
                                 throws NotExistException
        Obtains the TypedAttribute instance matching the key in this Theme.
        Parameters:
        key - Indicates the key in the theme.
        Returns:
        Returns the TypedAttribute instance.
        Throws:
        NotExistException - Throws this exception if the key is not found.
        Since:
        5

        public abstract int size​()
        Obtains the number of attributes in this Theme.

      • getPatternValue

        public abstract Pattern getPatternValue​(String key)
                                 throws IOException,
                                        NotExistException,
                                        WrongTypeException
        Obtains the Pattern instance matching the key in this Theme.
        Parameters:
        key - Indicates the key in the theme.
        Returns:
        Returns the Pattern instance.
        Throws:
        NotExistException - Throws this exception if the key is not found, or the obtained value is null or another invalid value.
        IOException - Throws this exception if an I/O error occurs.
        WrongTypeException - Throws this exception if the key does not match any Pattern instance.
        Since:
        5
